Description: Conversation with a misterious, hidden voice in the first room.

Sections.Description: Quiet hiss startles you. Is it real or could it be just your imagination? You start visually examining the surroundings.

Sections.Text: Errr... Hello? Who is it? Where are you?
Sections.Description: Turning around you keep checking all the corners of the room but can't tell where the voice is coming from.

Sections.Text: Quiter! You will wake them up! How did you get here?

Choices.Text: I... don't know... I don't know! What the hell is this place?
I am a private investigator looking for a... missing person. Perhaps you could help me?
I will not answer any of your questions until you show yourself. Where are you?

Sections.Text: Another one... God! How many more? This is getting ridiculous...
Listen closely. We don't have much time. This place is evil! Stay away from dark places.
What do you mean EVIL? Where the hell am I?

Sections.Description: You wait for a response but none comes. The silence feels very ominous.
Seconds pass and nothing else happens. You feel like leaving this room.

Sections.Text: You are what? Hahaha, don't make me laugh. Laugh is loud and dangerous.
There is a lost person here, yes, and that person is YOU!
I know perfectly well you haven't got a clue where you are and how you got here.
Show myself? Show myself and die? No, I pass. I need to hide. And you better hide too.
